resources.string: Save Access Key to My Photos
Remove all information associated with your account from Code\'s servers (phone number, contacts, transaction history)
You can access your account in other crypto wallet apps using your Secret Recovery Phrase. You won\'t be able to use your account in Code
Remove your account from the blockchain
This Kin was already collected by someone else.
Please allow access to the camera in Settings to use Code.
Please re-enter your phone number and try again.
Please allow access to the contacts in Settings to send invites.
We weren\'t expecting that to happen. Something went wrong. Please try creating this account again.
Please allow Code access to Photos in Settings in order to save your Access Key.
Something went wrong. Please ensure that you are using a phone number that was invited and that it is entered correctly.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Failed to withdraw your funds. Something went wrong, please attempt your withdrawal again.
Code is designed for small, everyday transactions that are for %s or less.
Code is designed for small, every day transactions. Your daily give limit will increase tomorrow.
To learn how to get more Kin go to the FAQ in Settings.
Please enter a different Invite Code and try again.
Please enter a valid phone number and try again.
Please enter a valid code and try again.
Sorry, we experienced a network issue. Please try inviting your friend again.
This Kin was automatically returned to the sender because it wasn\'t collected within 24 hours. Please ask them to send the Kin again.
Please re-enter your phone number and try again.
Please check your internet connection or try again later.
Code is currently invite-only. We will notify you when there are more invites available.
To join the waitlist go to %s
Your Access Key has initiated an unlock. As a result, you will no longer be able to use this Access Key in Code.
You can only create so many new accounts each day.
Access Key No Longer Usable in Code
Code is a crypto wallet app that makes it simple to use the cryptocurrency Kin.
As a not-for-profit organisation all the money we make is reinvested into achieving our mission of making crypto simple to use. Your support is appreciated.
For the more technically inclined you can visit the Technical FAQ.
Kin is a cryptocurrency like Bitcoin, only optimised for small, everyday transactions.
Your Kin is stored on the Solana blockchain. Only your Access Key can be used to access it.
Kin is like cash. The only way to get it back is for them to give it back.
No there arenâ€™t. Exchange rates are updated in real time and no fees are added.
The simplest way to buy Kin is from a friend who already has Code. You can also find other ways at reddit.com/r/buykin
Yes, you can. Kin can be sold on cryptocurrency exchanges. If you need help ask a friend who knows crypto.
Similar to other cryptocurrencies, the value of Kin is based on supply and demand. So if more people buy Kin the value increases, and if more people sell Kin the value decreases.
Code is a not-for-profit organisation that plans to sustain itself through an upcoming subscription model, similar to what apps like Signal and Twitter do.
What does Code do with the money it makes?
What if I want to learn more about how exactly Code works?
What if I accidentally give someone Kin?
Are there any fees when using different currencies?
How do I buy more Kin?
Why does the value of Kin change?
By tapping \"Create an Account\" or \"Log In\" you
Your camera is used to receive Kin. Please allow access to the camera to proceed.
We need push notifications to send you timely information about your account.
Withdrawals are irreversible and cannot be undone once initiated.
All funds in this account will be lost. Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this account?
Any Kin that isn\'t collected within 24 hours will be automatically returned to your balance.
You will need to restart account creation and verify your phone number again.
You can get back into this account using your Access Key
Only accounts created through Code are currently supported.
Your friends will no longer be able to find you with this phone number.
Your Access Key will grant access to your Code account. Keep it private and safe.
These 12 words are the only way to recover your Code account. Make sure you wrote them down, and keep them private and safe.
Are you sure you want to delete this account?
Are you sure you want to exit?
Are you sure you want to log out?
Your invitation to access Code has expired. You can log out and use a different account with a valid invitation status.
Your Access Key is the only way to access your funds. Please keep it private and safe.
Verify your identity to view your Access Key.
If you\'re on iOS15 or above, tap and hold the QR code to log in. Alternatively you can log in manually by entering the 12 words in the Code Log In screen.
Tap the Google Lens icon to open the QR code to log into Code. Alternatively you can log in manually by entering the 12 words in the Code Log In screen.
Code enables you to receive Kin by pointing your camera at the digital bill on another user\'s phone
You need to allow camera access to be able to receive Kin
You can only give up to %s
Make sure you have your Secret Recovery Phrase saved, and then enter \"Delete\" to delete your Code account. This action is irreversible.
Disabling Face ID requires you to verify your identity.
You don\'t have any Kin yet.
Enable Face ID to further enhance the security of transaction in Code.
Code uses the cryptocurrency Kin for payments. Here are some ways to get more Kin into your Code wallet.
Verify your identity to give kin.
Deposit Kin into your Code wallet by sending Kin to your Deposit Address below. Tap to copy.
Code is currently by invite only. You will need an Invite Code to access the app.
Code is a new crypto wallet app. Currently, it\'s invite only. To download Code, go to %s
Your phone number is linked with this Code account. Friends can find you using this phone number.
Check your photos for the Access Key you saved when you first created your account.
You\'re currently logged into an account. Please ensure you have saved your Access Key before proceeding. Would you like to log out and log in with a new account?
You don\'t have a phone number linked to this Code account. Link one so that your friends can discover you.
This phone number is not in your Contacts. You can still invite them to Code.
Enter your phone number including the country code. Make sure you use the same phone number that received the invite.
An SMS message was sent to your phone number with a verification code. Please enter the verification code above.
We\'ve made some changes to improve the experience. You\'ll need to update the app to keep using Code.
Where would you like to withdraw your Kin to?
Verify your identity to withdraw kin.
Code is currently invite only. You have %d remaining.
Your funds have been successfully withdrawn.
